description:
This change:

http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/9b1b65a4395511b07e15a521de3a3a66c4bdcfaa 

Fixed the bandwidth polling, but introduced another network_api lookup. Since the notification has access to the info_cache we can skip looking up the vif to get the instance_id.
title: Bandwidth polling floods the network manager
